# Module 3: Isaac Sim - Images and Visualizations

This directory contains screenshots and visualizations for Module 3 lessons.

## Image Inventory

### Chapter 7: Isaac Sim
- `isaac-sim-interface.png` - Isaac Sim main interface overview
- `photorealistic-scene.png` - Example photorealistic warehouse environment
- `synthetic-data-output.png` - RGB, depth, segmentation outputs
- `domain-randomization.png` - Before/after randomization comparison

### Chapter 8: Perception
- `vslam-mapping.png` - Real-time SLAM map building
- `object-detection-yolo.png` - YOLOv8 detections with bounding boxes
- `depth-map-visualization.png` - Stereo depth estimation output
- `pose-estimation-6dof.png` - 6DOF pose with 3D coordinate axes

### Chapter 9: Navigation
- `nav2-costmap.png` - Local and global costmaps
- `path-planning-astar.png` - A* global path visualization
- `behavior-tree-groot.png` - Groot behavior tree debugger
- `obstacle-avoidance.png` - Dynamic obstacle avoidance in action

### Chapter 10: RL
- `isaac-gym-parallel.png` - 4096 parallel environments
- `training-tensorboard.png` - TensorBoard training metrics
- `humanoid-locomotion.png` - Trained policy walking
- `sim-to-real-comparison.png` - Simulation vs. real robot

## Image Specifications

- **Format**: PNG (web-optimized)
- **Max Size**: 500KB per image
- **Resolution**: 1920x1080 or 1280x720
- **Color Space**: sRGB

## Generating Screenshots

1. Launch Isaac Sim with desired scene
2. Configure camera view for clarity
3. Press PrintScreen or use Isaac Sim screenshot feature
4. Crop and optimize with image editing tool
5. Add to this directory with descriptive filename

## Copyright

All images are created for educational purposes as part of the Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics course.
